doc.after: The iPad was released with three capacity options for storage: 16, 32, or 64Â GB of internal flash memory. On January 29, 2013, Apple announced a 128Â GB model of the fourth generation iPad, which was released on February 5.[14] All data is stored on the internal flash memory, with no option to expand storage. Apple sells a "camera connection kit" with an SD card reader, but it can only be used to transfer photos and videos.[79]
